137514.「我が名は 光導使メナー……\n 我らが主 聖光教主と 交わせし誓いのもと\n:
I am Menna, one of the Light Guides....
Under the oath exchanged with my master,
the Light Lord, I am here to guide you.

137515.「深遠なる意思に導かれ 紡がれし光芒。 \n 幾千もの光芒集いて 束になれば\n:
A woven radiance, guided by a profound will. When thousands of these radiances gather and unite as one, the inevitably become a
divine light.

137516.「聖光よ その大いなる輝きをもって\n この混迷の世界に あまねく降り注ぐ\n:
O divine light, with your great radiance...
Shower your rays of hope upon this
turmoiled world!

137517.「……ふう これでいいわ。それじゃ \n 英知の紋章を 高く かかげてちょうだい:
Whew...that's good. Now, hold up the Crest of
Wisdom as high as you can.

137518.<pc>は 英知の紋章を空高く かかげた。: <pc> holds the Crest of Wisdom high.

137519.「今 聖光を紡ぎし \n 闘戦士 <pc>の 英知のチカラを捧げ\n 次なる道を:
